author: Harry T Scholer
content: All the penalties that are on the books should be levied at these people. The Gulf and its whole ecosystem is vital to our economy and the idea that this has been allowed to go on for years is unbelievable.

author: Peter Wright
content: So will they do a lawsuit like the BP/Deepwater Horizon? I doubt it.

author: Allan Smith
content: Whenever I hear an energy company estimate of a spill, I multiply it by a factor of 10.

author: Phil
content:
I hardly ever it fish, ate too much as a kid when dad had a boat.
I know now I’ll never eat any ocean seafood now, you never know where it comes from!
